name: 資訊管理
description: 本課程主要目標係讓管院研究生瞭解如何利用資訊科技提升企業經營管理的效益、效率及提升競爭優勢。包含資訊科技的發展及其與經營管理需求的相互影響、資訊系統的要素、資訊系統規劃與建置、資訊管理於企業經營的應用、如何運用資訊科技提升競爭優勢以及相關的重要議題。
goals: Understand the elements and development of information technology, and its role in business operations
Understand how to use information technology to enhance competitive advantage, and to plan and develop information systems
Understand the moral and ethical issues related to information technology
Cultivate the ability to collaborate with peers to share information technology knowledge with the public
